whatIsBrujula.question: What is Br√∫jula Cripto?
whatIsBrujula.answer: A platform for digital asset protection and recovery with specialized tools and security guides.

howToStart.question: How do I start using the platform?
howToStart.answer: You can begin with our free interactive diagnostic in the Recovery section to assess your specific situation.

passwordRecovery.question: How does password recovery work?
passwordRecovery.answer: Our tool uses advanced algorithms to test combinations based on the partial information you provide.

diagnosticWizard.question: What is the interactive diagnostic?
diagnosticWizard.answer: A system that guides you step by step to identify the best solution according to your specific access loss situation.

transactionTracker.question: How do I track a transaction?
transactionTracker.answer: Enter the transaction hash or address in our tracker to get detailed information about status and destination.

serviceDirectory.question: What is the service directory?
serviceDirectory.answer: A curated list of professional services specialized in cryptocurrency recovery and security.

securityGuides.question: Where do I find security guides?
securityGuides.answer: In our Blog section we have specialized articles on security and best practices to protect your assets.

latestNews.question: Do you publish updated news?
latestNews.answer: Yes, our blog is regularly updated with the latest news and trends from the crypto world.

registration.question: Do I need to register to use the tools?
registration.answer: Some basic tools are available without registration, but creating an account gives you access to additional functionalities.

usageCredits.question: How do time credits work?
usageCredits.answer: The system uses time-based credits (seconds) for advanced tools. You receive initial credits when you register.

supportEmail.question: How can I contact support?
supportEmail.answer: You can write to us at soporte@brujulacripto.com or use the contact form on this page.

responseTime.question: How long does it take to respond?
responseTime.answer: Our team typically responds within 24-48 hours during business days.

contactSupport.title: Didn't find what you were looking for?
contactSupport.description: Our support team is ready to help you with any specific questions.

auth.providerRequired: useAuth must be used within AuthProvider
